SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class Step4Controller

java.lang.Object
help.Step4Controller
public class Step4Controller extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the actions of Step 4 in the cashier multi-step process.

      public Step4Controller()

  • Method Details

    • getProductTaxAmount

      public double getProductTaxAmount()
      Returns the amount of tax applied to products.
      Returns:
      The product tax amount.

    • getTicketTaxAmount

      public double getTicketTaxAmount()
      Returns the amount of tax applied to tickets.
      Returns:
      The ticket tax amount.

    • getTotalTaxAmount

      public double getTotalTaxAmount()
      Returns the total tax amount for both products and tickets. This method calculates the total tax by summing up the product tax and ticket tax amounts. It also prints the individual tax amounts for debugging purposes.
      Returns:
      The total tax amount (product tax + ticket tax).

    • calculateSeatTax

      private double calculateSeatTax(double basePrice)
      Calculates the tax amount for a seat based on the base price and a predefined tax rate.
      Parameters:
      basePrice - The base price of the seat before tax.
      Returns:
      The calculated seat tax amount.

    • calculateProductTax

      private double calculateProductTax(double basePrice)
      Calculates the tax amount for a product based on the base price and a predefined tax rate.
      Parameters:
      basePrice - The base price of the product before tax.
      Returns:
      The calculated product tax amount.

    • calculateDiscountSavings

      private double calculateDiscountSavings(double originalPrice, double discountedPrice)
      Calculates the savings from applying a discount to the original price.
      Parameters:
      originalPrice - The original price before the discount.
      discountedPrice - The price after the discount has been applied.
      Returns:
      The amount saved by applying the discount.

    • updateDiscountSavingsLabel

      private void updateDiscountSavingsLabel(int seatCount, double seatPrice, double discountedTotal)
      Updates the label showing the savings from a discount on the selected seats. This method calculates the original total price, the savings, and updates the UI label to display the savings.
      Parameters:
      seatCount - The number of seats selected.
      seatPrice - The price of a single seat.
      discountedTotal - The total price after discount is applied.

    • handleCloseButtonAction

      private void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the "Close" button is clicked. This method closes the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Close" button.

    • handleMinimizeButtonAction

      private void handleMinimizeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the "Minimize" button is clicked. This method minimizes the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Minimize" button.

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws Exception
      Initializes the components of the current view. This method is called when the controller is loaded. It performs the following tasks: - Updates the shopping cart labels. - Sets up the product table. - Loads the available products. - Sets seat price and updates selected shopping cart.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while initializing the components.

    • setSeatPriceLabel

      private void setSeatPriceLabel()
      Sets the label displaying the total seat price. This method also updates the tax label based on the current seat price.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while fetching the seat price.

    • updateTaxLabel

      private void updateTaxLabel()
      Updates the label displaying the total tax amount based on the current product and ticket taxes.

    • getTotalSeatPrice

      private double getTotalSeatPrice() throws Exception
      Calculates the total seat price, including any discounts applied to the selected seats. The method also calculates and sets the ticket tax amount.
      Returns:
      The total seat price after applying any discounts.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while calculating the seat price or fetching required data.

    • getTotalProductPrice

      private double getTotalProductPrice() throws Exception
      Calculates the total price of the products in the shopping cart, including their quantities. This method calculates the base price of the products and also calculates tax separately.
      Returns:
      The total price of the products in the cart, excluding tax.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while calculating the product price.

    • getsetTotalPrice

      private void getsetTotalPrice() throws Exception
      Updates the total price label by calculating the sum of the total seat price, total product price, and total tax. This method also updates the tax label.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while calculating the prices.

    • handleAddProductToCartAction

      private void handleAddProductToCartAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the action when the "Add Product to Cart" button is clicked. This method performs the following actions: - Retrieves the selected products from the product table. - Prompts the user for a quantity to add to the cart. - Updates the product stock in the database. - Adds the selected products and their quantities to the cart. - Updates the total price and tax labels.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "Add Product to Cart" button.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while adding the product to the cart or updating the database.

    • getQuantityFromUser

      private int getQuantityFromUser(Product product)
      Prompts the user to enter a quantity for the specified product. This method validates the input and ensures that the quantity is valid and available in stock.
      Parameters:
      product - The product for which the quantity is being requested.
      Returns:
      The quantity entered by the user, or -1 if the quantity is invalid or the user cancels.

    • handleApplyDiscountAction

      private void handleApplyDiscountAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the action when the "Apply Discount" button is clicked. This method performs the following actions: - Validates the customer's name and surname. - Checks if a discount has already been applied. - Validates and applies the discount based on the number of seats bought. - Updates the total price and tax labels.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "Apply Discount" button.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while applying the discount or calculating the prices.

    • updateShoppingCartLabels

      private void updateShoppingCartLabels()
      Updates the shopping cart labels for the selected movie, session, and seats. This method checks if the cart contains the selected movie, session, and seats and updates the corresponding labels accordingly. If no selection is made, it sets a default message.

    • handleNextButtonAction

      private void handleNextButtonAction() throws Exception
      Handles the action when the "Next" button is clicked. This method performs the following: - Sets the ticket details based on the shopping cart's selected movie, session, seats, and products. - Calculates the total costs (seats, products, tax, and discount). - Saves the ticket information to the database. - Loads the next scene (Step 5) for the next stage of the process.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the ticket creation, database interaction, or scene loading.

    • handleBackButtonAction

      private void handleBackButtonAction() throws Exception
      Handles the action when the "Back" button is clicked. This method performs the following: - Returns the selected products' stock to the inventory. - Unmarks the selected seats and updates the session's vacant seat count in the database. - Clears the shopping cart's session and selected seats. - Loads the previous step (Step 2) scene.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the database interaction.
      Exception

    • isValidName

      private boolean isValidName(String name, String fieldName)
      Validates a given name for required conditions. It checks if the name is not empty, has a minimum length of 2 characters, a maximum length of 50 characters, and contains only letters, spaces, and hyphens.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to be validated.
      fieldName - The name of the field being validated (used in error messages).
      Returns:
      true if the name is valid, false otherwise.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String message)
      Displays an alert with a specific type, title, and message.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of alert (e.g., ERROR, INFORMATION).
      title - The title of the alert.
      message - The message to be displayed in the alert.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action of signing out, including unmarking selected seats, returning products to the inventory, clearing the shopping cart, and navigating to the login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the sign-out button.

    • setupProductTable

      private void setupProductTable()
      Sets up the product table columns and custom cell factory for images.

    • loadProducts

      private void loadProducts() throws Exception
      Loads products from the database and populates the TreeTableView with product data.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading the products.

    • setselectedShoppingCart

      private void setselectedShoppingCart() throws Exception
      Sets the selected products in the shopping cart to be displayed in the UI.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while updating the shopping cart display.

    • showErrorDialog

      private void showErrorDialog(String errorMessage)
      Shows an error dialog with a specified error message.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - The error message to be displayed in the dialog.

    • showConfirmationDialog

      private void showConfirmationDialog(String message)
      Shows a confirmation dialog with a specified message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be displayed in the confirmation dialog.

    • validateCustomerName

      private boolean validateCustomerName(String name, String surname)
      Validates the customer's name and surname to ensure they are not empty, too short or too long, and contain only valid characters (including Turkish characters).
      Parameters:
      name - The first name of the customer.
      surname - The last name of the customer.
      Returns:
      true if the name and surname are valid, false otherwise.
